design:
# UI Library Refactor: shadcn/taki-ui Alignment

## Background

Comprehensive review of shadcn v4 and taki-ui revealed our component library has diverged from current best practices. This epic tracks alignment work.

## Key Findings

### Focus Ring Pattern
- **Current**: `ring-2 ring-ring ring-offset-2` (old shadcn)
- **Target**: `ring-3 ring-ring/50 border-ring` (current shadcn/taki-ui)

### DRY Patterns to Extract
1. `focusRing` - Reusable tv utility for focus states
2. `dropdownItemStyles` - Shared menu/listbox item styling

### Other Alignment
- Switch to Sonner for toasts (simpler, matches shadcn)
- Standardize disabled states (`data-disabled:` for RAC)
- Complete tv() extraction for remaining components
- Standardize destructive variant patterns

## Architecture Decisions

| Aspect | Decision | Rationale |
|--------|----------|-----------|
| Variants lib | Keep tv (tailwind-variants) | Better than cva, supports extend |
| UI primitives | Keep React Aria | Better a11y than Radix |
| Utility | Keep cx (custom) | Better RAC integration than cn |
| Focus pattern | Adopt shadcn v4 | `ring-3 ring-ring/50 border-ring` |
| DRY patterns | Adopt taki-ui approach | Extract focusRing, itemStyles |

## Tasks

### High Priority
- [ ] Focus ring pattern update + extraction
- [ ] Sonner migration (replace React Aria toast)
- [ ] dropdownItemStyles extraction

### Medium Priority
- [ ] Update disabled states to data-disabled:
- [ ] Complete tv() extraction (Card, Textarea, Label, Skeleton)

### Lower Priority
- [ ] Standardize destructive variant patterns

## Reference

- shadcn v4: https://github.com/shadcn-ui/ui/tree/main/apps/v4/registry/new-york-v4/ui
- taki-ui: https://github.com/jsartisan/taki-ui/tree/main/apps/v1/registry/new-york/ui
close_reason: All alignment work complete: focusRing + dropdown-styles extracted, Sonner migration done, disabled states handled by RAC plugin, destructive patterns already standardized, simple components don't need tv().

title: Update focus ring pattern and extract focusRing utility
design:
# Focus Ring Pattern Update & Extraction

## Current State
- Focus ring: `ring-2 ring-ring ring-offset-2` (old shadcn pattern)
- Invalid ring: `ring-2 ring-destructive/20`
- No shared utility - repeated inline in 15+ components

## Target State
- Focus ring: `ring-3 ring-ring/50 border-ring` (current shadcn/taki-ui)
- Invalid ring: `ring-3 ring-destructive/20 border-destructive`
- Optional: Extract reusable `focusRing` tv utility

## Pattern Comparison

| Aspect | Current | Target |
|--------|---------|--------|
| Ring width | `ring-2` | `ring-3` |
| Ring opacity | 100% | 50% (`ring-ring/50`) |
| Ring offset | `ring-offset-2` | None |
| Border change | No | Yes (`border-ring`) |

## Implementation Steps

### Step 1: Create focusRing utility (optional but recommended)

```tsx
// packages/ui/src/lib/focus-ring.ts
import { tv } from 'tailwind-variants';

export const focusRing = tv({
  base: 'outline-none',
  variants: {
    isFocusVisible: {
      true: 'border-ring ring-3 ring-ring/50',
    },
  },
});

// For components using CSS pseudo-classes instead of RAC render props
export const focusRingClasses = 
  'focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-3 focus-visible:ring-ring/50';

export const invalidRingClasses = [
  'aria-invalid:border-destructive aria-invalid:ring-3 aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20',
  'dark:aria-invalid:ring-destructive/40 dark:aria-invalid:border-destructive/50',
];
```

### Step 2: Update components

**Option A: Using extend (for RAC components with render props)**
```tsx
const checkboxVariants = tv({
  extend: focusRing,
  base: [...],
});

// Usage with render props
className={cx((renderProps) => checkboxVariants(renderProps), className)}
```

**Option B: Using CSS classes (for simpler components)**
```tsx
import { focusRingClasses, invalidRingClasses } from '../../../lib/focus-ring';

const inputVariants = tv({
  base: [
    '...',
    focusRingClasses,
    ...invalidRingClasses,
  ],
});
```

### Step 3: Components to update

**High priority (form inputs):**
- [ ] Input - `focus:ring-3` already, update pattern
- [ ] Textarea - same
- [ ] Checkbox - uses `ring-2 ring-offset-2`
- [ ] RadioGroup - uses `ring-2 ring-offset-2`
- [ ] Switch - uses `ring-2 ring-offset-2`
- [ ] Select - check pattern
- [ ] Combobox - check pattern
- [ ] Slider - check pattern

**Medium priority (interactive):**
- [ ] Button - uses `ring-2 ring-offset-2`
- [ ] Toggle - uses `ring-2 ring-offset-2`
- [ ] ToggleGroup - extends toggle
- [ ] Tabs - check pattern
- [ ] Accordion - check pattern
- [ ] Link - check pattern

**Lower priority (overlays/menus):**
- [ ] Dialog - check pattern
- [ ] Popover - check pattern
- [ ] DropdownMenu items - check pattern
- [ ] ContextMenu items - check pattern

## Search & Replace Patterns

Find:
```
focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2
```

Replace with:
```
focus-visible:border-ring focus-visible:ring-3 focus-visible:ring-ring/50
```

Find invalid patterns:
```
aria-invalid:ring-2 aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20
```

Replace with:
```
aria-invalid:border-destructive aria-invalid:ring-3 aria-invalid:ring-destructive/20
```

## Verification

```bash
# Check for old patterns
rg "ring-offset-2" packages/ui/src
rg "ring-2.*ring-ring[^/]" packages/ui/src

# Run tests
pnpm turbo run build --filter=@oakoss/ui
pnpm turbo run test --filter=@oakoss/ui
```

## Files to Create/Modify

1. Create: `packages/ui/src/lib/focus-ring.ts`
2. Update: `packages/ui/src/lib/utils.ts` (re-export)
3. Update: 15+ component files
close_reason: Focus ring pattern updated from ring-2/ring-offset-2 to ring-3/ring-ring/50 across all 12 components. Created focusRing utility in focus-ring.ts. All tests pass.

title: Internationalization (i18n) for the app
description:
Set up full internationalization support for the application.

## Overview
Enable the app to support multiple languages and locales. RAC components already support i18n via I18nProvider (set up in qd3.1), this epic covers the rest of the app.

## Scope

### Infrastructure
- Choose i18n library (react-i18next, next-intl, or similar)
- Set up translation file structure
- Configure locale detection (browser, URL, user preference)
- Add locale switcher UI

### Content Translation
- Extract hardcoded strings to translation keys
- Create translation files for supported locales
- Handle pluralization and interpolation

### Number/Date/Currency Formatting
RAC provides @internationalized/number for locale-aware number handling:
- **NumberFormatter** - Format numbers to locale-specific strings
- **NumberParser** - Parse locale-specific strings back to numbers
- Supports: decimals, percentages, currency, units
- Handles Latin, Arabic, and Han numbering systems
- Tiny bundle (1.7 kB with Brotli)
- Used internally by RAC NumberField

Date/time formatting via @internationalized/date (RAC DatePicker, DateField)

### Technical Considerations
- SSR/SSG support with TanStack Start
- URL-based locale routing (e.g., /en/dashboard, /fr/dashboard)
- Fallback locale handling
- TypeScript support for translation keys
- Bundle optimization (load only needed locale)

## Supported Locales (Initial)
- en-US (English - default)
- (Add more as needed)

## Dependencies
- qd3.1: RAC I18nProvider setup (foundation)

## References
- RAC I18nProvider: https://react-aria.adobe.com/I18nProvider
- RAC Internationalization: https://react-aria.adobe.com/internationalization
- @internationalized/number: https://react-aria.adobe.com/internationalized/number
- @internationalized/date: https://react-aria.adobe.com/internationalized/date

title: Add locale detection and switching
description:
Implement locale detection and user locale switching.

## Locale Detection Priority
1. User preference (stored in DB/localStorage)
2. URL parameter or path (e.g., /fr/dashboard)
3. Browser Accept-Language header

title: Add Note component for informational callouts
description:
Create Note component for static informational callouts. Separate from Alert which has role="alert" for urgent messages.

## Reference Implementation
Intent UI Note: https://github.com/intentui/intentui/blob/3.x/src/components/ui/note.tsx

## Why Separate from Alert?

**Accessibility distinction:**
- `Alert` has `role="alert"` - screen readers interrupt to announce (for urgent messages)
- `Note` has no special role - for static informational content that shouldn't interrupt

**Use cases:**
| Component | When to use |
|-----------|-------------|
| Alert | "Session expiring", "Payment failed", "Form errors" |
| Note | "Pro tip: ...", "Note: This requires Pro plan", "Info: Changes auto-save" |

## Component API

```tsx
<Note intent="info">
  <NoteTitle>Pro tip</NoteTitle>
  <NoteDescription>You can use keyboard shortcuts to navigate faster.</NoteDescription>
</Note>

<Note intent="warning" indicator={false}>
  <NoteDescription>This action cannot be undone.</NoteDescription>
</Note>
```

## Variants (intent prop)

| Intent | Icon | Color |
|--------|------|-------|
| default | None | Muted/secondary |
| info | RiInformationLine | Info palette |
| warning | RiErrorWarningLine | Warning/amber palette |
| danger | RiErrorWarningLine | Destructive palette |
| success | RiCheckLine | Success/green palette |

## Props
- `intent`: "default" | "info" | "warning" | "danger" | "success"
- `indicator`: boolean (default: true) - show/hide icon

## Files to Create
- packages/ui/src/components/ui/note/note.tsx
- packages/ui/src/components/ui/note/note.stories.tsx
- packages/ui/src/components/ui/note/index.ts

## Styling
Share color tokens with Alert where applicable, but no role="alert".
close_reason: Implemented Note component with 5 variants (default, info, warning, danger, success)

title: Refactor UI components to shadcn-style direct Tailwind classes
description:
Standardize all UI components to use shadcn-style patterns established in Button refactor.

## Pattern Changes

1. **Remove CSS variable indirection**
   - Before: `[--btn-bg:var(--color-primary)] bg-(--btn-bg)`
   - After: `bg-primary text-primary-foreground`

2. **Focus ring standardization**
   - Pattern: `focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-ring focus-visible:ring-offset-2`

3. **RAC state handling via renderProps**
   - Add `isDisabled` and `isPending` variants to tv()
   - Use cx() callback to spread renderProps into variants

4. **Solid destructive variant**
   - Pattern: `bg-destructive text-white` (not soft bg-destructive/10)

5. **Shadow on filled variants**
   - Add `shadow-sm` to default, secondary, destructive, outline variants

6. **Fix cx() vs cn() usage** (resolves nii)
   - cx() for RAC primitives (className can be render function)
   - cn() for static HTML elements

7. **Standardize on tv() over cva()** (resolves 2cz)
   - Convert Alert, Empty, Field, Input Group, Item, Navigation Menu, Sidebar, Toggle, Toggle Group

## Reference Implementation
See `packages/ui/src/components/ui/button/button.tsx` (commit cd87db5)

## Scope
All components in packages/ui that use CSS variable indirection, cva(), or inconsistent cx/cn patterns.
close_reason: Epic complete - all UI components refactored in commits cd87db5, d1cc4c0, fed2703
